title: White House gun control plan yet to materialize
text:
White House gun control plan yet to materialize 4:05am GMT - 01:59 
Three weeks after the nation's worst high school shooting, U.S. President Donald Trump met on Thursday with the makers of violent video games ''Grand Theft Auto'' and ''Doom'', as a promised White House plan to combat gun violence remains under wraps.   
Three weeks after the nation's worst high school shooting, U.S. President Donald Trump met on Thursday with the makers of violent video games "Grand Theft Auto" and "Doom", as a promised White House plan to combat gun violence remains under wraps.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/09/white-house-gun-control-plan-yet-to-mate?videoId=407324677&videoChannel=13422
